requirements.applies_to: Any person or business which conducts business in New York and owns or licenses computerized data

requirements.summary_text: Notify as quickly as possible, no later than 60 days after determination of breach

requirements.summary_text: Civil penalty of $100 to $250,000 for each violation; knowingly fails to comply: deceptive trade practice

requirements.summary_text: Notify no later than 30 days after determination of breach

requirements.applies_to: Covered entities (sole proprietorships, partnerships, corporations, etc.) that acquire, maintain, store, or use personal information

requirements.summary_text: Notify in the most expedient time possible, without unreasonable delay
requirements.applies_to: Any data collector that owns or licenses personal information concerning an Illinois resident

requirements.summary_text: Civil penalties up to $50,000 per violation; up to $100,000 for violations involving persons aged 65 or older; enforced under Consumer Fraud Act
requirements.applies_to: Any data collector that owns or licenses personal information concerning an Illinois resident

requirements.summary_text: Consumers can request disclosure of categories and specific pieces of personal information collected
requirements.applies_to: Businesses meeting CCPA thresholds: >$25M revenue, 100k+ consumers, or 50%+ revenue from data sales

requirements.summary_text: Consumers can request deletion of personal information; business must also direct service providers and third parties to delete
requirements.applies_to: Businesses meeting CCPA thresholds: >$25M revenue, 100k+ consumers, or 50%+ revenue from data sales

requirements.summary_text: Consumers can opt out of sale or sharing of personal information; 'Do Not Sell or Share My Personal Information' link required
requirements.applies_to: Businesses meeting CCPA thresholds: >$25M revenue, 100k+ consumers, or 50%+ revenue from data sales

requirements.summary_text: Consumers can opt out of targeted advertising, sale of personal data, and profiling producing legal or significant effects
requirements.applies_to: Controllers conducting business in Texas or producing products/services consumed by Texas residents; excludes small businesses (SBA definition)
